title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, green color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower right: J.P./36; in graphite, upper right: 9201; opening of right handle: d. 6 cm.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Flared cylindrical body drawn in elevation with four scrolling handles drawn in green pencil to be executed in plate-glass. Handles decorated on the inside with four small bands. Cup raised on a round base and foot. Underdrawing in graphite of cup in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink, green color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-18.
